rationale: Regimen includes 3 tablets with snack within 1h after dialysis, but omits note that drug is hepatically cleared and not removed by dialysis.
Lists week-4 trough HCV RNA, routine CMP, and tacrolimus level; bundle terminology not mentioned but orders correct.
Mentions override and 7-day release, but lacks baseline QTc 420 ms, 30 ms delta threshold, and plan for full-month refill.
EKG at week one and weekly if QT prolongs documented; routing of results to portal absent.
Continues emollient and adds cool compresses; misses >5/10 messaging instruction and contingency meds (hydroxyzine, rifampin).
HR>60, SBP>90, keep BP/dizziness log, bring Tuesday documented fully.
Captures concerns about antiviral timing, carvedilol delay, QT monitoring; itching concern partially implied but not explicitly listed.
Note covers most key decisions but misses several specific details (hepatic clearance, QTc values, portal routing, pruritus contingencies).
No fabricated or altered clinical data detected; only omissions.
No irrelevant chart copy; content focused on encounter.
